question: Which company partnered with NITI Aayog to implement Fertilizer subsidy disbursement through Blockchain Technology?
option4: Gujarat Narmada Valley Fertilizers & Chemicals Limited
answer: Gujarat Narmada Valley Fertilizers & Chemicals Limited
explanation: NITI Aayog and Gujarat Narmada Valley Fertilizers & Chemicals Limited (GNFC) have signed a Statement of Intent (SOI) today to work towards implementing a Proof-of-Concept (“PoC”) application using Blockchain Technology for fertilizer subsidy management.
